description: Written surety agreement to pay another's debt
facts: Sam signed a written guarantee to pay Tom's debt to United Bank if Tom defaults
Tom has already defaulted on the loan
Sam's signature is on the guarantee document
asp_facts: contract(c10). subject_matter(c10, surety). parties(c10, sam, united_bank). is_surety_agreement(c10, yes). has_writing(c10, yes). is_signed(c10, yes). debt_amount(c10, 75000). principal_debtor(c10, tom). debtor_defaulted(c10, yes).
question: Is the surety agreement enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: A promise to answer for the debt of another (surety agreement) must be in writing under the Statute of Frauds. This agreement is written and signed, satisfying the statute.
